product_name.description: The name or model of the lighting product

Lumen Output.description: The total luminous flux emitted by the light source, measured in lumens (lm)

Power Factor.description: A measure of how effectively the electrical power is being used

Color Temperature.description: The correlated color temperature (CCT) of the light emitted, measured in Kelvin (K)

Safety Classification.description: The safety standards or classifications the product adheres to (e.g., Class I, Class II)

IK Rating.description: A measure of the protection against mechanical impacts

Surge Protection.description: The level of protection against voltage surges (e.g., in kV)

Voltage.description: The operating voltage of the product (e.g., 120V, 277V)

LED Driver.description: Information about the LED driver used in the product

Materials and Finishing.description: The materials used in the construction of the product and its surface finish

Dimensions / Cut-out.description: The physical dimensions of the product or the required cut-out size for installation

Certifications.description: A list of certifications the product has obtained (e.g., UL, CE, DLC)

THD.description: Total Harmonic Distortion, a measure of the distortion of the electrical waveform

Wattage.description: The electrical power consumed by the product, measured in watts (W)

SDCM.description: Standard Deviation of Color Matching, a measure of color consistency between LEDs

Lifetime.description: The expected operational lifetime of the LED light source (e.g., in hours)

Mounting Type.description: How the product is intended to be mounted (e.g., Ceiling, Wall, Pendant)

UGR.description: Unified Glare Rating, a measure of the discomfort glare produced by a lighting installation

Flickering.description: Indicates whether the light source exhibits noticeable flickering

Efficacy.description: The ratio of luminous flux to power consumption, typically measured in lumens per watt (lm/W)

CRI.description: Color Rendering Index, a measure of how accurately the light source renders colors

Operation Temperature.description: The range of ambient temperatures within which the product is designed to operate

IP Rating.description: Ingress Protection rating, indicating the level of protection against dust and water

Optics.description: Description of the optical components used in the product (e.g., lens, reflector)

Warranty.description: The warranty period offered for the product
